function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extreme heat event and ozone interaction impacting respiratory health","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illnesses, especially for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement better ventilation systems, improve indoor air quality, and provide resources for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, HVAC systems, mechanical ventilation","People":"Populations with minimum resources, vulnerable to respiratory illnesses","Owner":"Local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increase in energy demand for residential buildings due to lockdowns","Impact":"Strain on energy resources and infrastructure, potential increase in energy costs","Mitigation":"Promote energy efficiency measures, invest in smart grid technology, and encourage energy conservation","Technologies":"Smart grid technology, energy-efficient appliances, renewable energy sources","People":"Residents in lockdown, energy providers","Owner":"Government, energy providers"},{"Description":"Decrease in energy demand for commercial buildings due to lockdowns","Impact":"Loss of revenue for commercial building owners, potential impact on employment","Mitigation":"Diversify business models, explore energy-saving opportunities, and provide financial support to affected businesses","Technologies":"Energy-saving technologies, renewable energy sources, smart building management systems","People":"Commercial building owners, employees","Owner":"Business owners, government"}]}
